spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct, but there is significant door placement error in the hallway and bedroom 2 transitions. Some window apertures on the right facade do not align perfectly with the source plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing the wall partition for the closet in Bedroom 1. The laundry room entrance is widened inaccurately. Hallucinated a second toilet/partition area in the bathroom suite.

furniture_mapping.notes: Good kitchen cabinetry and bedroom 1 placement. Bedroom 2 furniture is simplified and slightly misplaced. Dining chairs are slightly oversized compared to the floor plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality rendering with consistent lighting and clean geometry. The orthographic/isometric perspective is well-executed.

detected_errors.description: Missing closet partition wall in Bedroom 1.
Hallway doors to bathroom and laundry shifted or merged incorrectly.
Hallucinated an extra toilet and partition wall within the main bathroom area.
Laundry room doorway width is distorted relative to the floor plan.
Interior door wing direction in Bedroom 2 does not match the source diagram.
